Package com.idevicesinc.sweetblue

Class ScanFilter.ScanEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.utils.Event
      • com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.ScanFilter.ScanEvent
  • Enclosing interface:
    ScanFilter
    public static class ScanFilter.ScanEvent
extends Event
    Instances of this class are passed to ScanFilter.onEvent(ScanEvent) to aid in making a decision.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.util.List<java.util.UUID> advertisedServices()
      A list of UUIDs parsed from scanRecord() as a convenience.
      int advertisingFlags()
      Returns the advertising flags, if any, parsed from scanRecord().
      State.ChangeIntent lastDisconnectIntent()
      See explanation at BleDevice.getLastDisconnectIntent().
      java.lang.String macAddress()
      Returns the mac address of the discovered device.
      byte[] manufacturerData()  
      java.util.List<ManufacturerData> manufacturerDataList()
      Returns the manufacturer-specific data, if any, parsed from scanRecord().
      int manufacturerId()  
      java.lang.String name_native()
      The unaltered device name retrieved from the native bluetooth stack.
      java.lang.String name_normalized()
      See BleDevice.getName_normalized() for an explanation.
      android.bluetooth.BluetoothDevice nativeInstance()
      Other parameters are probably enough to make a decision but this native instance is provided just in case.
      int rssi()
      The RSSI received when the device was discovered.
      byte[] scanRecord()
      The raw scan record received when the device was discovered.
      java.util.Map<java.util.UUID,​byte[]> serviceData()
      Returns the service data, if any, parsed from scanRecord().
      java.lang.String toString()  
      int txPower()
      Returns the transmission power of the device in decibels, or BleNodeConfig.INVALID_TX_POWER if device is not advertising its transmission power.

    • Method Detail

      • nativeInstance

        public android.bluetooth.BluetoothDevice nativeInstance()
        Other parameters are probably enough to make a decision but this native instance is provided just in case.

      • advertisedServices

        public java.util.List<java.util.UUID> advertisedServices()
        A list of UUIDs parsed from scanRecord() as a convenience. May be empty, notably if BleManagerConfig.revertToClassicDiscoveryIfNeeded is invoked.

      • name_native

        public java.lang.String name_native()
        The unaltered device name retrieved from the native bluetooth stack.

      • name_normalized

        public java.lang.String name_normalized()
        See BleDevice.getName_normalized() for an explanation.

      • scanRecord

        public byte[] scanRecord()
        The raw scan record received when the device was discovered. May be empty, especially if BleManagerConfig.revertToClassicDiscoveryIfNeeded is invoked.

      • rssi

        public int rssi()
        The RSSI received when the device was discovered.

      • txPower

        public int txPower()
        Returns the transmission power of the device in decibels, or BleNodeConfig.INVALID_TX_POWER if device is not advertising its transmission power.

      • macAddress

        public java.lang.String macAddress()
        Returns the mac address of the discovered device.

      • lastDisconnectIntent

        public State.ChangeIntent lastDisconnectIntent()
        See explanation at BleDevice.getLastDisconnectIntent().

        TIP: If lastDisconnectIntent() isn't State.ChangeIntent.NULL then most likely you can early-out and return true from ScanFilter.onEvent(ScanEvent) without having to check uuids or names matching, because obviously you've seen and connected to this device before.

      • advertisingFlags

        public int advertisingFlags()
        Returns the advertising flags, if any, parsed from scanRecord().

      • manufacturerDataList

        public java.util.List<ManufacturerData> manufacturerDataList()
        Returns the manufacturer-specific data, if any, parsed from scanRecord().

      • manufacturerData

        public byte[] manufacturerData()

      • manufacturerId

        public int manufacturerId()

      • serviceData

        public java.util.Map<java.util.UUID,​byte[]> serviceData()
        Returns the service data, if any, parsed from scanRecord().

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
